definition: to wipe one’s ass/(fig.) (coll.) to clean up sb else's mess
to wipe/to erase/rubbing (brush stroke in painting)/to clean/to polish
fart/flatulence/nonsense/(usu. in the negative) what/(not) a damn thing

thigh/part of a whole/portion of a sum/(stock) share/strand of a thread/low-level administrative unit, translated as "section" or "department" etc, ranked below 科[ke1]/classifier for long winding things like ropes, rivers etc/classifier for smoke, smells etc: thread, puff, whiff/classifier for bands of people, gangs etc/classifier for sudden forceful actions

sentences.english: Still have to wipe my own arse though so needs more work.
sentences.chinese: 但是依然得自己擦屁股，所以需要再接再厲。

sentences.english: They once made a Ron Artest toilet paper, but it wouldn't take sh_t from anybody.
sentences.chinese: 有人試圖做阿泰牌手紙，結果誰也沒辦法用它擦屁股。

sentences.english: The whole country cleans up the mess this state leaves behind.
sentences.chinese: 整個國家都在爲密蘇里州擦屁股。

sentences.english: The first one said, "But I don't have any paper to wipe my ass."
sentences.chinese: 第一個人說，“可我沒帶擦屁股的紙。”
